title: Building Permits
description: A detailed view of building permits and permit applications

ApplicationNumber.description: A unique indentifier for the build permit application, or some ID

Type.description: Short code for the folder type or type of permit being sought eg. BG, GS

PermitDescription.description: The longer description of the folder type code, denotes permit type(application type) eg Building Permit, Gas Permit

ReportCode.description: A report code for the permit application eg PERMIT, PROJECTING, FACIA SIGN

StatusDescription.description: The status of the permit eg. Issue, Cancelled, Complete

InDate.description: The date the permit was applied for(application date)

IssueDate.description: The date the permit was issued

CompleteDate.description: The date the work was completed

FeeCalculationDate.description: The date the fee will be calculated by

SubjectDescription.description: A description of the work location or what the work is on

WorkDescription.description: A short description of the type of work, or permit purpose

UnitNumber.description: The unit number of the location

HouseNumber.description: The house number where the work is being done

Street.description: The street where work is being done

Address.description: The full address of the location for the permit usage

NeighborhoodName.description: The name of the neighborhood where work is being done.

FolioNumber.description: The folio number of the property

LegalDescription.description: The legal description of the permit/work

ParcelType.description: The type of parcel the work is being done on

ActualUse.description: The actual use of the land the permit is being used on eg. Hotel, Office Building

Value.description: The value of the work proposed

ContactType.description: The tpye of contact for the permit eg. Application, Builder

CompanyName.description: The name of the company, group, or person applying for the permit or whom the permit belongs to

CompanyMailingAddress.description: The mailing address of the company responsible for the permit

ContactPhoneNumber.description: The phone number of the contact that holds the permit

ContactCellPhoneNumber.description: The cell phone number of the contact that holds the permit

ContactEmailAddress.description: The email address of the contact that holds the permit

ContactFaxNumber.description: The fax number of the contact that holds the permit
